29#include <gelf.h>
30
31#include "_libelf.h"
32
33__RCSID("$NetBSD: libelf_checksum.c,v 1.3 2016/02/20 02:43:42 christos Exp $");
34ELFTC_VCSID("Id: libelf_checksum.c 3174 2015-03-27 17:13:41Z emaste ");
35
36static unsigned long
37_libelf_sum(unsigned long c, const unsigned char *s, size_t size)
38{
39 if (s == NULL || size == 0)
40 return (c);
41
42 while (size--)
43 c += *s++;
44
45 return (c);
46}
47
48long
49_libelf_checksum(Elf *e, int elfclass)
50{
51 size_t shn;
52 Elf_Scn *scn;
53 Elf_Data *d;
54 unsigned long checksum;
55 GElf_Ehdr eh;
56 GElf_Shdr shdr;
57
58 if (e == NULL) {
59 LIBELF_SET_ERROR(ARGUMENT, 0);
60 return (0L);
61 }
62
63 if (e->e_class != elfclass) {
64 LIBELF_SET_ERROR(CLASS, 0);
65 return (0L);
66 }
67
68 if (gelf_getehdr(e, &eh) == NULL)
69 return (0);
70
71 /*
72 * Iterate over all sections in the ELF file, computing the
73 * checksum along the way.
74 *
75 * The first section is always SHN_UNDEF and can be skipped.
76 * Non-allocatable sections are skipped, as are sections that
77 * could be affected by utilities such as strip(1).
78 */
79
80 checksum = 0;
81 for (shn = 1; shn < e->e_u.e_elf.e_nscn; shn++) {
82 if ((scn = elf_getscn(e, shn)) == NULL)
83 return (0);
84 if (gelf_getshdr(scn, &shdr) == NULL)
85 return (0);
86 if ((shdr.sh_flags & SHF_ALLOC) == 0 ||
87 shdr.sh_type == SHT_DYNAMIC ||
88 shdr.sh_type == SHT_DYNSYM)
89 continue;
90
91 d = NULL;
92 while ((d = elf_rawdata(scn, d)) != NULL)
93 checksum = _libelf_sum(checksum,
94 (unsigned char *) d->d_buf, (size_t) d->d_size);
95 }
96
97 /*
98 * Return a 16-bit checksum compatible with Solaris.
99 */
100 return (long) (((checksum >> 16) & 0xFFFFUL) + (checksum & 0xFFFFUL));
101}
102
